InputEvent Class Reference

#include <InputEvent.h>

Inheritance diagram for InputEvent:

List of all members.

Detailed Description

An input event issued by the platform adapter.

The input handling of the adapter instantiates sub classes of this class and adds them to the desktop's event queue by using its addEvent() method.

See also:
Desktop::addEvent()

InputEvent (  bool  option1,
bool  option2
)  [protected]
 

Creates a new input event.

Parameters:
option1 Whether the option button 1 is currently pressed, e.g. on Windows systems, this is the SHIFT key.
option2 Whether the option button 2 is currently pressed, e.g. on Windows systems, this is the CTRL key.
